com.fxgraph.cells

Class CellGestures

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.cells.CellGestures

  • public class CellGestures
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles cell resize handles (bounding rect corners and edge midpoints) display and interaction.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static interface  CellGestures.DragNodeSupplier
      Any draggable cell handle must implement this interface.
      (package private) static class  CellGestures.Wrapper<T>
      TODO [ogallagher] document this class; I don't understand its purpose.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static CellGestures.DragNodeSupplier EAST
      Create a cell drag handle at the east edge, handling mouse events and creating the handle widget to be displayed.
      (package private) static double handleRadius
      The radius of the cell drag handle (half of the width).

      Create a cell drag handle at the north edge, handling mouse events and creating the handle widget to be displayed.

      • makeResizable

        public static void makeResizable(Graph graph,
                                 javafx.scene.layout.Region region)
        Convenience method for calling makeResizable(Graph, Region, DragNodeSupplier...) with DragNodeSuppliers for all corners and edges.
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph containing the cell.
        region - Cell graphic.

        Synchronizes cell drag handles with their associated cell, ensuring that the drag handles belong to the same graph canvas as the their cell.

        region -
        nodeSuppliers -

      • setUpDragging

        private static void setUpDragging(Graph graph,
                                  javafx.scene.Node node,
                                  CellGestures.Wrapper<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> wrappedEvent,
                                  javafx.scene.Cursor hoverCursor)
        Extracts common mouse event handling shared by many cell resize handles. This takes care of changing the cursor, beginning a cell handle drag, and ending a drag.
        Parameters:
        graph - Graph to which the cell belongs.
        node - The cell handle.
        wrappedEvent - The wrapped mouse event.
        hoverCursor - The cursor to use when hovering over this cell handle.
